title: GCLA ANNUAL MEETING & HOLIDAY PARTY
desc: GCLA Members, please join us at our Annual Meeting. The Annual Business Meeting is a chance for all members to review and ratify Board actions in 2015. As important as GCLA lobbying efforts have been in Sacramento, direct member feedback and direction is essential for the enhancd success of the GCLA's lobbying efforts, which have a direct impact on all livery operators and drivers. Enjoy good food and drinks while networking with industry operators and learning about important CA legislative updates. Special Guest:? Assemblymember,? Adrin Nazarian Itinerary: 530p - 630p, cocktail reception (Tuskegee Room) 630p - Dinner Buffet opens 645p - 730p, Annual Meeting 730p - 930p, networking and socializing Special sponsor presentations, vehicle displays and raffle! ? For questions and comments contact: Tom Garrett Association Manager 213 440 4634 Tom@GCLA.or
